title: Client Crashing
body: Two days in a row, I've been having issues with my client crashing. And I'm not even doing the same thing, it literally has a message that pops up saying "lol.execlient has stopped working." When I click okay it crashes the client.

replies.body: Is this during champion select?  If so, do you have any third party apps running?  If you have programs like play.tv, overwolf, etc, they have been known to cause issues like this.  Disable them and let me know if that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Ons3O3E5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-16T23:05:34.259+0000)
>
> Is this during champion select?  If so, do you have any third party apps running?  If you have programs like play.tv, overwolf, etc, they have been known to cause issues like this.  Disable them and let me know if that helps!

Yes, it was play.tv. Thanks!

I've been having a similar issue. It has been since your last update to the client. I go through champ select fine. Load game fine. After the game starts, and I have bought items and start moving around, I get a pop up  from windows that states the client is no longer work. This closes the game client, but the background client is still active and I am able to reconnect. The duration for this event to proc varies but is under 1 minute consistently. This is frustrating and leads to me being in poor places when it occurs and vulnerable to attacks.

It sounds like there is something that's causing the game to not render properly.  It can be due to driver or game file issues, which would cause it to crash.  I suggest downloading our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and heading over to our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot this.  Go over each step, and the HRT will be able to help with some of them automatically.  Hopefully, that will get you fixed up!
